title: The Sweetheart Next Door
description: Amy tried to forget him……and his wicked tongue.Why did she have to fall for a celebrity?She was a home body not a groupie.Her parents would never approve.What did it matter?Drew aka mega pop star probably didn’t even remember her.After all, they had only shared one night together.But he’s back in town……And it’s going to get steamy.This rom-com will keep flicking from page to page until you get to the finish.The SweetHeart Next Door was originally published in 2021, titled His Cabbage Tosser, as part of the charity anthology “Eat Your Heart Out.”
author: Rachel A. Smith
